Package maldiniPaone.servlets.managers.interfaces

Interface ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserManager
public interface ManageRegistrationByMunicipalities
This interface defines the signatures of the methods to manage registrations made by municipalities

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean registerAuthority​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String cityHallName, java.lang.String cityHallProvince, Location topLeftDistrictBound, Location bottomRightDistrictBound)
    registers Authority by municipality in the same cityHall.
    boolean registerMunicipalityByMunicipality​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String cityHallName, java.lang.String cityHallProvince)
    registers Municipality by another municipality in the same cityHall.

  • Method Details

    • registerMunicipalityByMunicipality

      boolean registerMunicipalityByMunicipality​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String cityHallName, java.lang.String cityHallProvince) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      registers Municipality by another municipality in the same cityHall.
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of the municipality to be added
      password - : the password of the municipality to be added
      email - : the email of the municipality to be added
      creator - : the username of the municipality creating the other municipality
      cityHallName - : the name of the city hall of the creator
      cityHallProvince - : the province of the city hall of the creator
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • registerAuthority

      boolean registerAuthority​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String cityHallName, java.lang.String cityHallProvince, Location topLeftDistrictBound, Location bottomRightDistrictBound) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      registers Authority by municipality in the same cityHall.
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of the authority to be added
      password - : the password of the authority to be added
      email - : the email of the authority to be added
      creator - : the username of the municipality creating the authority
      cityHallName - : the name of the city hall of the creator
      cityHallProvince - : the province of the city hall of the creator
      topLeftDistrictBound - : the coordinates of the top left bound of the district where the authority works
      bottomRightDistrictBound - : the coordinates of the bottom right bound of the district where the authority works
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)
